awd_abstract_narration: The Department of Mathematics at the University of Michigan will                purchase 20 Sparc workstations, two printers and needed                         networking which will be dedicated to support of research in the                mathematical sciences.  The equipment will be used for several                  research projects in algebra, combinatorics, scientific                         computation, analysis and computational geometry/topology.                      Primarily the equipment being purchased will be used by graduate                students and junior faculty working in these areas in                           collaboration with senior faculty and additionally by three                     senior faculty.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences

inst.inst_name: Regents of the University of Michigan - Ann Arbor
inst.org_lgl_bus_name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN
